.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageMemoryBind-subresource-parameter]] pname:subresource must: be a valid sname:VkImageSubresource structure
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageMemoryBind-memory-parameter]] If pname:memory is not dlink:VK_NULL_HANDLE, pname:memory must: be a valid sname:VkDeviceMemory handle
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageMemoryBind-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkSparseMemoryBindFlagBits values
****
